createModal.publicDescription: Public games are discoverable by everyone.

deleteModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?
deleteModal.title: Delete Game
deleteModal.warning: This action cannot be undone. All game data will be permanently deleted.

editFields.description: Give the game a short description. This is just for you and won't affect gameplay.
editFields.gameStartHint: What happens at the start? Describe the first scene that the player sees. How is the player welcomed?
editFields.gameStartPlaceholder: You wake up at the edge of a dark forest. A narrow path leads deeper into the trees...
editFields.imageStyle: What style should the game's images have?
editFields.imageStyleHint: For example: cartoon, realistic, pixel art, watercolor...
editFields.name: Game Name
editFields.scenarioHint:
Briefly describe: How does the game work? What's the world like? Language & Tone (e.g. Spanisch for sixth graders)?
What role does the player have? Write "The player ...". 
If you want the AI to take the role of a specific person write "You are ...".
editFields.scenarioPlaceholder: You are an explorer in a mysterious forest. Your goal is to find the hidden treasure...
editFields.statusFieldsHint: What should the game keep track of? For example health, points, or ammo. The game remembers these values and updates them while playing.

unsavedChanges.message: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them?
unsavedChanges.title: Unsaved Changes

errors.aiError: The AI service encountered an error. Please try again.
errors.backendUserFetch: Failed to load user data from server. Please try again.
errors.billingNotActive: Your OpenAI account is not active. Please check your billing details at https://platform.openai.com/settings/organization/billing.
errors.conflict: This action conflicts with existing data. Please try again.
errors.contentFiltered: Your request was filtered by the AI's content policy. Please try rephrasing.
errors.forbidden: You don't have permission to perform this action.
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.insufficientQuota: Your API key has run out of credits. Please add more credits or use a different API key.
errors.invalidApiKey: Your API key is invalid or expired. Please check your API key in Settings.
errors.invalidPlatform: Invalid platform selected. Please choose a valid option.
errors.invalidToken: Your session has expired or is invalid. Please use your invite link again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.orgVerificationRequired: Your OpenAI organization needs verification to use the image generation feature. Please verify at https://platform.openai.com/settings/organization/general.
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
errors.server: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.duplicateName: The name for this game is already in use. Please choose a different name.
errors.nameProfane: This name is not allowed. Please choose a different name.
errors.nameTooLong: The name is too long. Please choose a shorter name.
errors.workshopInactive: This workshop has been deactivated. Please contact your teacher or workshop organizer.
errors.userNotRegistered: You need to complete registration before continuing.
errors.validation: Please check your input and try again.
